metadata.title: CVE-2018-10756 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: Use-after-free in libtransmission/variant.c in Transmission before 3.00allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) or possiblyexecute arbitrary code via a crafted torrent file.

criterions.comment: transmission: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
